text: The VI Velká Cena Masarykova (1935 Masaryk Grand Prix) was a 750 km Grand Prix motor race held on 29 September 1935 at the Masaryk Circuit. All layouts of the Masaryk Circuit (Brno Circuit) between 1930 and today combined ==Classification== {| border="2" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 0; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font- size: 95%;" !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Pos !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| No !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Driver !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Team !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Car !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Laps !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Time/Retired !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Grid !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Points |- ! 1 | 8 | Bernd Rosemeyer | Auto Union | Auto Union B | 17 | 3:44:10.6 | 3 | |- ! 2 | 16 | Tazio Nuvolari | Scuderia Ferrari | Alfa Romeo 8C-35 | 17 | + 6:37.8 | 7 | |- ! 3 | 18 | Louis Chiron | Scuderia Ferrari | Alfa Romeo Tipo B | 17 | + 6:41.6 | 8 | |- ! 4 | 20 | Antonio Brivio | Scuderia Ferrari | Alfa Romeo Tipo B | 17 | + 8:01.4 | 9 | |- ! 5 | 10 | László Hartmann | L.
